## AccordeonBuilder.group() method

Adds a control group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
group(title: string, opts: Partial<GroupModel>, builder?: (b: Builder) => void): GroupModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  title | string | The group label |
|  opts | Partial&lt;[GroupModel](./tweak-ui.groupmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Additional control options |
|  builder | (b: [Builder](./tweak-ui.builder.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | A callback allowing to build sub controls |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GroupModel](./tweak-ui.groupmodel.md) &amp; [Removable](./tweak-ui.removable.md)
